website_summaries.verdict: Powerful, with commercial-level quality and superior backing from the manufacturer.
pros: Boasts a 21.1-cubic-centimeter Pure Fire engine in a lightweight, 10.3-pound unit
Has a 5-position rear handle and strong 24-inch blade
Includes a 2-year commercial or 7-year consumer warranty
cons: Some testers had issues with the starting mechanism, but the warranty provides peace of mind

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality and works great for hedge trimming and shaping, I was using a Shindaiwa hedge trimmer that was over 20 years old and worn out, so I bought the Tanaka with the 30" blades and it is like driving a new car, the blade is very sharp and cuts through thick hedges like a knife through butter, It is also very quiet so it is less fatiguing to use for long hours, I take care of the landscaping at several estates with extensive hedges, the Tanaka TCH22ECP has cut my labor time in half
customer_reviews.author: Jayson

customer_reviews.title: It will cut anything!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband for early Christmas gift, he said that he didn't want to borrow his friends anymore. He researched them and found this one. He has used it twice and loves it. Said that it was easy to operate and designed with a handle that moves to different positions. Said he would stand by this product as long as it doesn't give him any trouble. I give a five star.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Hundley

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Great Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Incredible machine, even better price. The big name gas trimmers start at twice the price. This machine is strong, it starts right up and it’s versatile with the three positions on the handle. It literally takes a second to change the position of the trigger relative to the blades. That makes it easy to trim sides, tops and the back of hedges. Don’t be fooled by the brand Tanaka it’s been around for awhile and it’s a quality brand used by many professionals and homeowners alike. This gas trimmer is a time saver. Unplug that corded trimmer and get with the program, like I did. You won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Mic

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I have used Tanaka tools before with excellent results. This is also a quality tool with double cutting blades. Most of all it is about 2 -3# lighter than competitive units. This gets important after using it for awhile and reaching out over the top of shrubs.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Frame

customer_reviews.title: Like the tanaka chain saw which I also purchased
customer_reviews.text: I have been mowing down an old thicket of ten foot tall black berry vines. Like the tanaka chain saw which I also purchased, this is a high quality tool.
customer_reviews.author: Willy

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Really love my machine, light weight and smooth, powerful, quiet... Should have gotten one of these years ago. 2019 update. I do really love the machine and it's operation, it did develop a fuel leak, one of the fuel lines was leaking and I had to pay $45 to have it diagnosed and fixed. Not happy about that so soon. I did notice a few others had the same issue. Something to consider, but again the machine itself is fantastic, starts quick and runs perfectly, trims so nice and clean, well designed and quality built, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: drew johnson

customer_reviews.title: Pink fuel line broken...
customer_reviews.text: bought two years ago but only lightly used once. this year, when i tried to use it and found pink fuel line was broken. it is material and quality issue. also it is hard to find the parts as no one recognize model TCH22EAP2
customer_reviews.author: LeeeLooo

customer_reviews.title: Hedge Trimmer with movable handle
customer_reviews.text: I have a craftsman hedge trimmer that worked pretty good , bought the Tanaka and this is lighter a bit ,filled with fuel oil mix and pumped bulb about 10 times moved choke on and it started on first pull and with movable handle so much easier to maneuver through the hedges and how I wish I had found this sooner absolutely the best one I have used and have had 2 others beside the craftsman . highly recommend ,
customer_reviews.author: Bill R

customer_reviews.title: The best trimmer that I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: The trimmer is well made. It is real easy to start . The trimmer has some feather that I.ve not seen before , like lub. for the trimmer and adjustment for the trimmer blades.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Strickland

customer_reviews.title: BUY TANAKA!!!!! IT STARTS EZ IT WORKS.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing not to like! I'm a 65 yr young gal & it is so ez to start which was my main concern. It is ez to maneuver & cuts hedges perfect. Last set I had was ryobi & I got so mad i launched that piece of crap out in middle of yard. BUY TANAKA!!!!! IT STARTS IT WORKS.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to Impossible to start
customer_reviews.text: Tanaka hedge trimmer worked the first summer I had it (2019) but was temperamental to start. Second summer I have had it (2020), I have not been able to get it to run. I have tried everything to get it running but have finally given up. Having someone troubleshoot the device costs more than it is worth to look at/repair given its history of starting difficulties. Moving on to a different hedge trimmer - Stihl!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard L Basnaw

customer_reviews.title: Tanaka fulfills its advertised quality and function.
customer_reviews.text: I used this trimmer to top 500 feet of Arbor Vitae hedge this fall. It was wonderful! cut and ease of use is extraordinary. I even dropped the unit from a six foot height onto a concrete walkway and it is undamaged. Cranked right up an finished the last 400 feet without a 'blip'.
customer_reviews.author: D. G. Orr

customer_reviews.title: Will not start
customer_reviews.text: Out of box, will not start, no spark. Have a few two cycle machines and know how this should work. I'm 4 days past return time. Poor quality control. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: always starts, great hedge trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Been using Tanaka products for 20 plus years always works well
customer_reviews.author: hank

customer_reviews.title: Three stars
customer_reviews.text: 5/20/18: First rate. Not a single problem. Update: 9/27/18 Well after using the trimmer a few times it’s now leaking gasoline big time. Changing my rating from 5 stars to 3 stars. It does a beautiful job of trimming if you ignore the puddle of gas you are standing in. Update: 10/11/18 Replaced Return Grommet and Fuel Pipe and leak appears to be fixed. Leaving at 3 stars since it shouldn’t need to be repaired after only a few uses. It does do a nice job of trimming however.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Good products so far
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit if last while not sure of this brand have chainsaw same brand its seems pretty dependable so far home owner use is about it
customer_reviews.author: Steven nunes

customer_reviews.title: Easy, cuts well, fast, I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Cuts right through limbs. Mobility is great, no worrying about losing charge. The only think I don’t like is the smell of gas. I’d buy this again. I haven’t had it long, but beat the heck out of our electric one.
customer_reviews.author: D.E.

customer_reviews.title: Great trimmer, great price
customer_reviews.text: Still going strong 1 year later. It's no Honda but the price is right and it continues to run great
customer_reviews.author: LoafTheTabby

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great product...works well! This hedge cutter performs in every way it says. Starts easy, lightweight, cuts through hedge branches with little difficulty. I recomend for others to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Good equipment
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, not heavy, cuts smoothly and evenly. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: ANON.

customer_reviews.title: Great gas trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Great gas trimmer with lower-end commercial power. Have been using to clear multiple overgrown areas on an old farm I bought and this thing fires up every time and handles most everything I throw at it.
customer_reviews.author: B Burton

customer_reviews.title: Super pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value. Works great and could not be happier with this purchase. Rotating grip is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: David Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good trimmer.
customer_reviews.text: This hedge trimmer met or exceeded my expectation. I use it to trim back my blueberry bushes.
customer_reviews.author: Fritzel

customer_reviews.title: Good equipment
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is light enough that you can keep going.
customer_reviews.author: book club member

customer_reviews.title: Trims great
customer_reviews.text: It works great but seemed a little heavy but it is really powerful which may account for the weight. It is the first time I have used a motorized trimmer
customer_reviews.author: Jim J

customer_reviews.title: Light weight not perfomace
customer_reviews.text: Finally a gas trimmer my wife can use . Cuts great easy to use
customer_reviews.author: RPM

customer_reviews.title: Out of box failure
customer_reviews.text: Out of box would not start after 1/2 he of trying, packed it up for return, ordered a replacement as the unit looked nice, will try one more time; so far not impressed
customer_reviews.author: Francesca

customer_reviews.title: Starts easy.  Very powerful cutting
customer_reviews.text: I have never been disappointed with a Tanaka product. Excellent quality
customer_reviews.author: Joe S.

customer_reviews.title: don't even think about it
customer_reviews.text: complete junk with no support for parts- model number does not even come up on any parts sites- used for 4 hours. trash trash trash
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Handle, Hard to Start
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and handle adjustments makes it easy maneuver and results in a very precise trim BUT have been unable to use it on two occasions as it would not start. Company support never returned my call.
customer_reviews.author: REC

customer_reviews.title: Light weigh, and priced fairly well.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used my new piece a equipment. I Have a pruning job scheduled for this next week. And plan on putting this Tanaka to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great but it is heavy after a while of use. If you are not in shape this may not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie B

customer_reviews.title: Great Hedge Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and cuts wonderfully. No worries of cutting the cord on electric hedge trimmers or running out of juice with a battery operated unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are lighter than most and cut is clean. ...
customer_reviews.text: They are lighter than most and cut is clean. I wouldn't hesitate to buy them again. I've used other top trimmers and they work just as well.
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: tanaka for the win
customer_reviews.text: Great trimmer have owned all of the brands and been a landscaper 20 yrs best i have had!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this unit, tanaka know how to do it, it is very strong, easy to start
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: ... can become a little heavy after a while but excellent trimmer. My favorite new tool
customer_reviews.text: It can become a little heavy after a while but excellent trimmer. My favorite new tool.
customer_reviews.author: Honey Badger

customer_reviews.title: Starts right up every time and does a fantastic job. It's a little bit heavy for me
customer_reviews.text: Starts right up every time and does a fantastic job. It's a little bit heavy for me, but it's a great hedge clipper. We especially like the rotating handle.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had one for 27 years gave it to my son, need a new one
customer_reviews.author: Linda or Raymond Van Hoorebeke

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this product. I have cut through 3/4 in stems with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: K. Deal

customer_reviews.title: I love the trimmer style
customer_reviews.text: I love the trimmer style,weight not bad.The 20in. blade is all the length a home owner need.I haven't use it yet,the trimmer is well blanced.
customer_reviews.author: harold b schley

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't start
customer_reviews.text: It would not start after numerous attempts. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike W.

customer_reviews.title: Gator
customer_reviews.text: Didnt find nothing to dislike about it it started easy run and idols great best value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Very light duty, jammed up the second time I used it with a metal burr on one of the blades. I was clearing brush (blackberries). The third time i used it the blades completely fell apart, 4 fasteners had come loose and fell out. Very difficult (nearly impossible) to find parts for this product. Very disappointed, will never buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pook

customer_reviews.title: Workhorse, commercial grade
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast! Wish I had bought one long ago.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: A little heavy after holding a while. But well worth it. Very nice machine
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I had an electric trimmer but now i entered the pro gear :) Works like a charm, Cuts thick brunches easily. I use 3% oil mixed with 95 petrol , no hicups & easy sturtup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent trimmer, cutting smoothly and efficiently through even thick branches
customer_reviews.author: Leo V. Burkey

customer_reviews.title: gets the job done and more
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my landscaping business and it runs amazingly
customer_reviews.author: Edgarruv

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: This thing rips! I bought the Tanaka chain saw about a year ago and it has been awesome so I thought I'd try their hedge clippers. Only have used them once so far but they were fantastic. I bought the 20" and compared to my electric 20", I feel like I can do a job in half the time because they cut so well on the 1st pass. Some people may feel these are a little heavy. They were good for me but after about a 5 hr job my arms were a little worn out.
customer_reviews.author: fishlabs

customer_reviews.title: Started first pull and hasn't stopped. Ran it for ...
customer_reviews.text: Started first pull and hasn't stopped. Ran it for about 3 hours during first use and no stutters or stops. Solid piece of equipment!
customer_reviews.author: Baron5

customer_reviews.title: Buy American!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hedger on the recommendation of others from Amazon. However, this item has been leaking gas from (because of a faulty grommet) which spills fuel continually which is a serious hazard. I have emailed the company countless times over the last 2 months to get a replacement part and no one has contacted me. The manufacture is overseas and can't be contacted by phone. American repairs facilities will not work on it because they don't have parts I am stuck with a $228.oo paper weight which I can't use.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Used one time. The second time the fuel line busted and it's leaking all over the place. Don't buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald G. Matteson

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mine didn't last very long. Very hard to get parts.
customer_reviews.author: T. Fortier

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hedger looked great. However, it would not start. I sent it back and got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and works great after using it on many jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Poor 1st start
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, I could tell it was not commercial grade. Poor 1st start. Then, second time I used it, tree branch as big as my baby finger, caused the blade to break on the edge, jam the blades. I had to use my # 2 Felcos to undo the damage get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Nice medium home hedger.
customer_reviews.text: LIke it alot, EXCEPT that the settings had to be changed. I dont like that...It should have been set properly prior to leaving manufacturing facility. The trimmer feels less than stated weight and since i am a woman of short stature and not the strongest in the world, This really helps. Overall i am glad i finally have a more powerful gas hedger bec no matter which electric one, they simply don't measure up.
customer_reviews.author: Love movies that make you think.

customer_reviews.title: poor made poor delivery
customer_reviews.text: I had to send mine back , received late, handle loose, an I could never get to start....Yes I have two other two stroke gas motors TORO which I never had a problem with...poor made poor delivery.
customer_reviews.author: don

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does great job. A little heavy weight but not unbearable.
customer_reviews.author: wallace

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed to find out that this is now made in ...
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to find out that this is now made in China as I knew Tanaka in the past to be a Japanese company with high quality standards. I found out that they still make their top line in Japan. It works ok, but we will see how it holds up. Almost wish I had paid a little more for the Stihl or Husqvarna now. After using twice last season, now i try to use it and the fuel line going into the tank is broken already, gas all over me and now I can't get my trimming done. Stick with Stihl, Husqvarna or Echo.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Barth

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: ran it once. lost the air cleaner cover and cant find how to get it back
customer_reviews.author: Mel Patterson

customer_reviews.title: It’s what he wanted
customer_reviews.text: My son said he likes it very much. That’s the most I could get out of him.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

product_meta.title: Tanaka TCH22EBP2 21cc 2-Cycle Gas Hedge Trimmer with 24-Inch Commercial Double-Sided Blades
product_meta.description: Size:24" BladesGeared toward the professional landscaper, the Tanaka TCH22EBP2 gas powered hedge trimmer boasts a powerful 21.1 cc Pure Fire 2-cycle engine at a mere 10.3 pounds. For maximum cutting efficiency, the 24" commercial grade cutting blades are three-sided and dual reciprocating. Fast and easy starting is provided by a purge bulb as well as S-Start which reduces the amount of pull-force required by 50 percent. This commercial grade hedge trimmer features a 5-position rear handle which provides for more comfortable operation and a forward-facing exhaust to prevent burnt hedges. The Tanaka TCH22EBP2 gas hedge trimmer is backed by a 2-year commercial warranty and an industry leading 7-year consumer warranty. Additional specifications and features include: 10.3 pounds, 10.1 fluid ounce fuel tank capacity, blade safety tip, cut branches up to 3/4" thick, 50:1 gas/oil ratio, CARB/EPA compliant (300 hour rated), 22" effective blade length, 35mm blade pitch, 3 face blades, reciprocating upper and lower blades, includes box wrench (10 x 19 mm) with Philips screwdriver, blade case.
feature_bullets: Tanaka 21.1cc commercial grade 2-cycle engine for maximum reliability and durability
5 position rear handle for maximum comfort and maneuverability
24" commercial dual reciprocating blades. 0.3 liter fuel tank ensures long operating times between each break for refueling
Purge bulb and S-start technology for smooth, low-effort pull starts

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars126 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
